casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. GORDON B. CLIFFORD, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 6579B DATED this 24th day of April, 1975.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of 5 years for Theft and Issuing a Bad Check imposed on January 17th, 1975, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Reverend Skribrub for his assistance to the defendant and to this court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack D. Shanstrom, Chairman; Jack L. Green.
